revision.comment: (bot:fi) add pronunciation from automatically generated but manually curated list
revision.text: ==Finnish== ===Etymology=== {{compound|fi|yhteistoiminta|laki|t1=cooperation|t2=act|id2=law}}; short for ''laki yhteistoiminnasta yrityksissä'', decree nr. 334/2007. ===Pronunciation=== {{fi-p|yhteis-toiminta/laki}} ===Noun=== {{fi-noun}} # {{lb|fi|legal}} [[act|Act]] on Co-operation within [[undertaking|Undertakings]] {{gloss|law aiming to enhance employees’ opportunities to be heard in decision-making in workplaces and improve their position in organizational changes, especially in reduction of workforce}} ====Usage notes==== * In some other countries similar pieces of legislation are called "Industrial Cooperation Act". ====Declension==== {{fi-decl-risti|yhteistoimintala|k||a}} ====References==== * Full English version of the law [http://www.finlex.fi/en/laki/kaannokset/2007/en20070334.pdf].
